participant_1.name: Avery
participant_1.personality: Reflective and calm, with a deep focus on their spiritual journey.
participant_1.background: I live in Alaska. I quit my job to pursue my spirituality full time. I am a Buddhist. I have not spoken in three months. I like meditation.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and determined, with a love for sports and a competitive spirit.
participant_2.background: I work in the insurance business. My father is in the army. I love playing softball. I recently was fired and had to get a new job.

content.text: hey there i recently was fired and i love playing softball
